name: RIFT Alki
description:
The Alki is the longest deck in our line making it great for downhill cruising in stiffer flexes. Go with a softer flex if cruising around town is more your style. This board is a smooth carving, precision machine built for speed. The Alki is available in three flex patterns.

Length 46"
Width 10"
Wheelbase 32"

Flex

Stiff: for riders 200+ lbs
Mid: 150+ lbs
Soft: under 150 lbs

name: RIFT Interceptor
description:
The second longest board in our line, the Interceptor is an excellent downhill slalom board in stiffer flexes. Or, pick up a softer flex for an energetic, fun, around town cruiser. The strategic cutouts allow for variable truck and wheel sizes to create a truly custom ride. The Interceptor is available in three flex patterns.

Length: 45.5"
Width: 10"
Wheelbase: 30.75"
Weight: 3 lb 12 oz

Flex

Stiff: for riders 200+ lbs
Mid: 150+ lbs
Soft: under 150 lbs

name: RIFT Phantom
description:
Our most versatile board, the Phantom delivers a smooth, fast ride great for all around riders. This board tends to be a bit stiffer than some longer boards which allows the Phantom to be extremely responsive. The Phantom is available in three flex patterns.

Length: 43"
Width: 8.75"
Wheelbase: 28"
Weight: 3 lb 5 oz

Flex

Stiff: for riders 200+ lbs
Mid: 150+ lbs
Soft: under 150 lbs

name: RIFT Rocket
description:
The Rocket is small enough to be a back pack board but long enough to be a smooth, quick cruiser. This board is great for college campuses with lots of obstacles to cruise around. The Rocket is available in two different flex patterns.

Length: 38"
Width: 8.75"
Wheelbase: 25.5"
Weight: 2 lb 13 oz  

Flex

Stiff: for riders 150+ lbs
Soft: under 150 lbs

name: RIFT Menace- Stiff Flex
description:
All RIFT Longboards are manufactured in the USA using high pressure (several 1000 lbs) closed mold compression molding processes. Carbon fiber and exotic fiberglass wrapped around a light weight core in varying layups allow us to produce the most advanced, responsive line of longboards available. The Menace is made with a full wrap of carbon fiber, top and bottom, with additional strategically placed carbon fiber strips present in the mid and stiff flex boards. The variable flex patterns allow the rider to choose the optimal board for their riding style and weight. A lighter weight, more aggressive rider may want a stiffer board while a larger rider into cruising may choose a softer flex. Whatever your style, we have a board to fit.

The Menace is our ultimate, high end, drop through free ride deck. Designed for high speed downhill racing and sliding, the Menace has built in power pedals that provide unbelievable responsiveness and control. Drop through deck mounts, grab rails and its super light weight make the Menace the most advanced board in the RIFT line.

Flex: Stiff for riders 200 lbs plus
Riding Style: Downhill racer and slider / Great high end cruiser in softer flex
Specs: Length 41.5" / Width 9.9" / Wheelbase 31"
Weight: under 3 lbs
MADE IN THE USA
